Text: Hope you're feeling better soon, best wishes to you from Canada for a speedy recovery (and many many thanks for the Eastenders episodes!!).

Thanks a lot again Bente :). Ill wait for you. :)
Love from Norway.

Nice one on this thing mate, 
Somebody needs to give the hospital a good kick, Hope you feel better soon..
Thank you Jorunn, my very good old friend.
Jorunn, if I was a guy, I could fall in love with you.

I want to thank you too. Im orginally from the UK and now in the states use to get the show on BBC America until they decided to charge to watch its great thanks to you for your hard efforts. i wish you luck even as bad as the system is its worse here if you dont have any medical. The states will never have a system like that because they make to much money here.
Thank you from Canada. Hope you get well soon.

Finally, they have a bed, I'm going in today. 
It's only really for tests at first, so I hope to be back on duty for Monday.

That was a good episode yeterday.
